code: import React,{useRef,useEffect}from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import'./header.scss';import logo from'../../assets/tmovie.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const headerNav=[{display:'Home',path:'/'},{display:'Movies',path:'/movie'},{display:'TV Series',path:'/tv'}];const Header=()=>{const{pathname}=useLocation();const headerRef=useRef(null);const active=headerNav.findIndex(e=>e.path===pathname);useEffect(()=>{const shrinkHeader=()=>{if(document.body.scrollTop>100||document.documentElement.scrollTop>100){headerRef.current.classList.add('shrink');}else{headerRef.current.classList.remove('shrink');}};window.addEventListener('scroll',shrinkHeader);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('scroll',shrinkHeader);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:headerRef,className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header__wrap container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"tMovies"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"header__nav",children:headerNav.map((e,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:`${i===active?'active':''}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:e.path,children:e.display})},i))})]})});};export default Header;
